creator: Happy Dino Games
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to be the face of justice? Then look no further! Don the role of the best sniper in town in this action packed casual sniper game. Sniper: Casual Mafia Shooter is a one of a kind shooting game that can keep you entertained for hours!
Get all the outlaws with this chronicle game! Try Sniper: Casual Mafia Shooter to take on the boots of this dreary land's life saver. Explore various locations & be ready to shoot down the villans, rescue civilians, kill the terrorists, avert disasters and more.
Pityful thugs have decided to reek havoc and get away with it. But they haven't met their match yet - a tough sniper – The hero who can fight back and claim his victors and restore security once again!
Feel like a conqueror, a peircing sniper, fighting for justice with the eyes of a hawk. This fight is going to get messy! Will you be the one to save innocents?
Your gun is your only friend in this diresome battle. Aim, shoot, and repeat - The rules are simple but vital. This game isn't anyone's rodeo. You are in the midst of deadly danger and you have to survive by all means. Shoot back from cover with your trusty weapons - rifles, pistols and whatnot - vanquish your enemies in exhilarating battles!
This sniper game will allure you with the soul of a hero, who is able to clear the land from gangs of robbers and protect the people. A fascinating thrill awaits you.
Top features of Sniper: Casual Mafia Shooter
- One of the most action-packed FPS shooting games
- Genuine atmosphere of the Mafia
- Gun and revolver shooting modes: aim and see your enemies in the scope
- Various challenging locations. Try to shoot them down at every location.
- Game store with lots of rifles to choose from
- Genuine music & sound effects to recreate the Mafia
Test your marksmanship, hitman! Start playing our exciting online / offline sniper combat and beat your top score!
Let's get started! It's time to take out all the bad guys!
Hit all the targets in this casual FPS game. Bull's eye!

This sniper game will allure you with the soul of a hero, who is able to clear the land from gangs of robbers and protect the people. A fascinating thrill awaits you.
Top features of Sniper: Casual Mafia Shooter
- One of the most action-packed FPS shooting games
- Genuine atmosphere of the Mafia
- Gun and revolver shooting modes: aim and see your enemies in the scope
- Various challenging locations. Try to shoot them down at every location.
- Game store with lots of rifles to choose from
- Genuine music & sound effects to recreate the Mafia
Test your marksmanship, hitman! Start playing our exciting online / offline sniper combat and beat your top score!
Let's get started! It's time to take out all the bad guys!
Hit all the targets in this casual FPS game. Bull's eye!
descriptionShort: Are you ready to be the face of justice? Then look no further!
title: Sniper Mafia Shooter

creator: Happy Dino Games
descriptionHtml:
Sniper Mafia Shooter game is a gripping action shooter game where you get to experience the mafia wars and be a sniper shooter.

Get ready to travel back in old times when the grand mafia clash between the clans was heated. Are you brave enough to fight the street gangs and face the different mafia bosses? Get that sniper ready and shoot the gangsters!


Step ahead and fight various gang members, to reach the mafia bosses corrupting different areas of the city. Complete contracts and wipe the whole clans running those states.

Interesting targets and missions to play in this mafia sniper game, each level comes with new excitement and quest. Try out different characters which suit your personality the best with multiple weapon options. Enjoy new locations with new goals.

Your weaponry includes different snipers and rifles, crossbows and even bow arrows. Sniper Mafia Shooter lets you experience different weapons too!

Snipe the gangsters not only in the city but hotels, casinos, beaches, train stations even hot air balloons. Fulfill numerous and thrilling assignments like destroying boats or stopping illegal deliveries.

Make sure not to kill the poor civilians along your hunt or you lose cash points. After all, we need to keep a low profile and complete our tasks.



Game Features:



Tasks:

Each level brings new assignments and tasks to do. Fulfill your list to complete each mission and move on.



Locations:

Experience various fun locations in the game. Brilliant arts and details to make the most of the experience.



Weapons:

Multiple weapons to experience in one sniper game. Not just sniper but rifle, crossbows and bow arrows



Character Selection:

Different unique characters to unlock and play with. Unlock your whole team and enjoy the mafia wars with style.



Practice Mode:

New to the game? Do not worry, we got your back! Special environments for you to practice your skills and improve your shooting with each weapon.
